This library and its developers are not responsible for any damage done by malware made by this library, This library is made to help
new devs get around some stuff and makes the job easier for the developers.

However as this library is useful as it is, it can certainly be used to make malware, as this library features that could certainly
do some shady things.

if anybody's system & any system is damaged by the use of this library in any kind of malware.
